title: Britain's First Light
abstract: A selection of films made by British youth with the guidance of professional filmmakers.
description: 'First Light' is a British wide organisation that uses film and media production to develop skills in young people aged up to 25. Talented youth from a wide range of backgrounds are provided with training led by film and media industry professionals using industry standard equipment. This package draws works from several years of this creative partnership.
